skill.name: plan
skill.description: Guidelines for iteratively planning tasks and changes before implementation. Use this when the user requests a non-trivial task or when you need to align on a complex implementation strategy.
skill.summary: Guidelines for iteratively planning tasks and changes before implementation. Use this when the user ...
skill.author: 0xmsc

security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based skill containing only markdown documentation. No executable code, network calls, filesystem access, or external command execution. The skill provides behavioral guidelines for AI task planning.

content.value_statement: Complex AI tasks often fail due to unclear scope or missing requirements. This skill provides a structured workflow for gathering requirements, drafting implementation plans, and getting user approval before writing any code.
actual_capabilities: Guide AI to explore codebase before planning
Structure plans with objective, approach, steps, and verification
Generate clarifying questions with proposed answers
Wait for user approval before implementation
limitations: Does not execute planning steps automatically
Does not integrate with project management tools
Does not generate code or modify files
Relies on user to provide approval

use_cases.title: Feature Implementation Planning
use_cases.description: Plan new features with clear scope, dependencies, and verification steps before coding begins.

use_cases.title: Complex Task Decomposition
use_cases.description: Break down large AI tasks into manageable milestones with iterative feedback loops.

use_cases.title: Architecture Review Workflow
use_cases.description: Establish consistent planning process for team code changes and architectural decisions.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Planning Request
prompt_templates.prompt: Plan the implementation of [describe your task]. Follow the planning workflow: gather information, draft a plan with objective, approach, steps, and verification, then ask clarifying questions.

prompt_templates.title: Refine Existing Plan
prompt_templates.prompt: Refine the previous plan based on this feedback: [describe changes]. Update the plan and wait for my approval before proceeding.

prompt_templates.title: Risk-Aware Planning
prompt_templates.prompt: Plan a [describe dangerous operation like bulk refactoring or database migration]. Identify the most risky parts and propose safe verification steps for each.

prompt_templates.title: Exploration-First Planning
prompt_templates.prompt: Explore the codebase to understand [specific area]. List dependencies and existing patterns, then draft a plan that aligns with the codebase conventions.

output_examples.input: Plan a user authentication system for our React app
output:
## Plan: User Authentication System

**Objective**: Add secure login/logout with JWT tokens

**Approach**: Implement auth with protected routes

**Steps**: 1) Install dependencies 2) Create auth context 3) Build login form 4) Add API endpoints 5) Implement protected routes

**Verification**: Test login flow, verify protected routes work, confirm token refresh

**Clarifying Questions**:
1. Which auth provider? [Proposed: Auth0]
2. Session duration? [Proposed: 24 hours]
3. Need social login? [Proposed: Google only]

Awaiting your approval to proceed...

best_practices: Always explore the codebase before planning to understand existing patterns
Include at least three clarifying questions with proposed answers
Wait for explicit user approval before starting implementation
Break large tasks into iterative milestones rather than big design up front
anti_patterns: Starting implementation without user approval or clarification
Creating overly detailed plans for massive tasks
Skipping risk identification for dangerous operations
Deviating from the agreed plan without explaining why

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. It provides planning guidelines compatible with any LLM-based coding assistant.

faq.question: How detailed should the plan be?
faq.answer: Keep plans concise and actionable. Focus on the immediate milestone rather than trying to plan every detail of a large project.

faq.question: Can I integrate with Jira or other tools?
faq.answer: This skill does not directly integrate with external tools. It provides verbal planning workflow between you and the AI assistant.

faq.question: Is my data safe with this skill?
faq.answer: This skill contains no code that accesses files or sends data anywhere. It only provides behavioral guidelines for planning conversations.

faq.question: What if the plan needs changes during implementation?
faq.answer: Stop implementation, explain the deviation, and ask for approval on the updated plan before continuing.

faq.question: How is this different from other planning approaches?
faq.answer: This skill enforces an iterative approach with explicit approval checkpoints rather than upfront comprehensive planning.
